name: Hitchhiking Xho Qur
description:
Embark on a tiny adventure across Xho Qur! See the sights! Meet the locals! Nod politely as every word goes over your head, or try and decipher their language without the insufferable coddling of that £5.99 Xhonese phrasebook!

Made for the December 2021 "mushrooms" Bitsy Jam.
